A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is a fun ride. I think people are rating it too harshly after a single viewing. I've seen it 3 times and it gets better with every viewing I pick up more intricate details. This movie is a think piece on the nature of good and evil in a non-traditional Star Wars way and the theme of failure and why it's important is ever present and can teach a great lesson. Symbolism heavy\, but it's worth it. It does have pacing issues in the middle because of a certain plot that is only there to service characters\, but the more I watch it the more I realize that despite these issues it's still very much enjoyable.
